'''PlayPoi''' is an online platform for learning [[poi]] spinning, founded by [[Nick Woolsey]]. It hosts structured tutorial progressions covering [[Flower (flow arts)|flowers]], [[Continuous Assembly Patterns|CAPs]], [[antispin]] patterns, and other poi techniques.<ref name="playpoi">{{cite web |url=https://playpoi.com/about-playpoi/links/ |title=About PlayPoi |publisher=PlayPoi}}</ref>

PlayPoi popularized the alternative expansion "Capped Antispin Patterns" for [[Continuous Assembly Patterns|CAP]] and made the technique accessible to intermediate spinners.<ref name="playpoi-caps">{{cite web |url=https://playpoi.com/learn/learning-caps-capped-antispin-patterns/ |title=Learning CAPs (Capped Antispin Patterns) |publisher=PlayPoi}}</ref>

The site also offers an advanced poi course through Udemy.<ref name="playpoi-advanced">{{cite web |url=https://playpoi.com/advanced-poi/ |title=Advanced Poi |publisher=PlayPoi}}</ref>
